name: dermal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
for, in, or relating to the skin: Dermal fillers are used to plump up wrinkles. The finger must still be cleansed with alcohol and allowed to dry before a dermal puncture is made.
More examplesFewer examples These dermal papilla cells mature into hair follicles.An over-the-counter product can't make a significant difference because it can't penetrate dermal layers.Workers who come in dermal (skin) contact with hexane experience immediate irritation.
